description:
Beyonce has been confirmed to play Nala in the upcoming live-action Lion King Film.碧昂斯确认出演即将开拍的真实版《狮子王》电影中的娜娜（Nala）。

Disney took to their Twitter on Wednesday to announce the cast of the highly-anticipated film which included the 36-year-old Queen Bey Herself.周三，迪士尼在推特上宣布众星云集的演员表，其中包括36岁的女王碧昂斯亲自出演。

She will be joining a star-studded cast including Donald Glover who will take on the role of main protagonist Simba.她是豪华演员阵容中的一员，其中唐纳德·格洛弗饰演辛巴。

Beyonce has joined the cast of Disney's live-action remake of the 1994 animated classic The Lion King.这次碧昂斯参演的迪士尼真实版电影是1994年经典动画的翻拍。

Disney unveiled the full cast for the new film, which is set for release in 2019. The Halo singer will be playing the voice of Simba's love interest Nala.新片预计在2019年面世，迪士尼公布了新电影的演员表。著名歌手碧昂斯会配音辛巴的青梅竹马娜娜。

Comedian Billy Eichner and Seth Rogen will play Timon and Pumbaa respectively, with Last Week Tonight host John Oliver as Zazu.喜剧演员比利·艾希纳和塞斯·罗根会分别出演丁满和彭彭，《上周今夜秀》的主持人约翰·奥利弗会出演沙祖。

James Earl Jones will be reprising his role as Simba's father Mufasa from the 1994 flick, which no doubt is exciting news for fans of the original.最让原剧的忠粉激动的是，沿袭1994年版本詹姆斯·厄尔·琼斯还是会出演辛巴的爸爸木法沙。

Oscar-nominated actor Chiwete lEjio for will be taking on the role of villain Scar.奥斯卡提名演员切瓦特·埃加福特会出演恶棍刀疤。

Alfre Woodard - who was nominated for an Oscar in 1984 for her role in Cross Creek - will be playing Simba's mother and Mufasa's wife Sarabi.阿尔法·沃德1984年因出演《十字溪流》而提名奥斯卡女演员，将出演辛巴的妈妈，木法沙的妻子萨拉碧。

Jon Favreau will be directing the film as he was behind the earlier cast announcements as well as even hinting that the project was happening.乔恩·费儒在演员表公布以后被任命为该电影的导演，自此这个项目一切就绪。

Last year Disney confirmed the original 1994 movie will be given a live-action reboot and the 51-year-old filmmaker - who helmed the 2016 remake of The Jungle Book - admitted he is excited about the project.去年迪士尼就确定会翻拍1994年的经典而且会是真人出演，51岁的电影制作人，2016年翻拍《森林王子》(英语:The JungleBook),就表示他对这个项目很感兴趣。

In a tweet complete with emojis of a lion and a crown, he wrote: 'Excited for my next project'在推特上他发了一个狮子和一个皇冠的表情，写到“想到我的下一个任务就觉得激动人心。“

Disney also confirmed songs from the 1994 movie will feature in the new motion picture and admitted the movie is on the 'fast-track to production' for the eventual release in the summer of 2019.迪士尼确认沿用1994年电影中的歌曲，配上新的动画，而且为了2019年夏天的上映，一切都在紧锣密鼓的进行中。

Classic tunes from the film include Circle of Life, I Just Can't Wait to Be King, Be Prepared, HakunaMatata and Can You Feel the Love Tonight, which were written by Sir Elton John and Sir Tim Rice.经典歌曲包括《生生不息》（Circle of Life）、《等我长大来当王》（I Just Can't Wait to Be King）、《准备好》(Be Prepared)、《彭彭丁满》（HakunaMatata）、今夜爱无限（can you feel the love tonight）这些都是由Elton John先生和Tim Rice先生所作。

Can You Feel the Love Tonight played out over the credits and went on to win Best Original Song at the 1995 Academy Awards.歌曲《今夜爱无限》因《狮子王》一炮而红，而获得了1995年奥斯卡原创歌曲奖。

（翻译：林浔鸥）
